title: Async Rate Limiting Implementation
description: Epic: Implement async rate limiting per docs/plans/2026-02-06-async-rate-limiting.md. 5 tasks: T0 fix cache.py global endpoint, T1 add aiolimiter dep, T2 create VertexRateLimiter, T3 create GreyCloudAsyncClient, T4 export from __init__.py

comments.author: John B. Fleming
comments.text: Plan file: docs/plans/2026-02-06-async-rate-limiting.md. Execute with superpowers:executing-plans skill. TDD: write failing test first, then implement, then verify, then commit. Task order: T0 (cache fix, independent) -> T1 (aiolimiter dep) -> T2 (rate_limiter.py) -> T3 (async_client.py) -> T4 (exports). T0 can run in parallel with T1.

title: T0: Fix cache.py to use config.location instead of hardcoded global
description: cache.py:95 hardcodes location='global'. Change to self.config.location. Add test to TestGreyCloudCacheClient verifying location pass-through. See plan docs/plans/2026-02-06-async-rate-limiting.md Task 0.

title: T1: Add aiolimiter dependency to pyproject.toml
description: Add aiolimiter>=1.1.0 to dependencies in pyproject.toml. Run pip install -e '.[dev]' to verify. See plan Task 1.

title: T2: Create VertexRateLimiter class
description: Create greycloud/rate_limiter.py with VertexRateLimiter (RPM token bucket + TPM token bucket + asyncio.Semaphore). Create tests/test_rate_limiter.py. See plan Task 2.

title: T3: Create GreyCloudAsyncClient
description: Create greycloud/async_client.py with GreyCloudAsyncClient using client.aio and VertexRateLimiter. Create tests/test_async_client.py. See plan Task 3.

title: T4: Export new classes from __init__.py
description: Add VertexRateLimiter and GreyCloudAsyncClient to greycloud/__init__.py exports and __all__. Update tests/test_init.py. Run full test suite. See plan Task 4.

title: Fix version mess: publish 0.3.4, bump to 0.3.5
